Participants receive single oral 1000 milligram ( mg ) dose abiraterone acetate fast condition either Treatment A ( current commercial formulation , uncoated ) , Treatment B ( current commercial formulation , coat ) Treatment C ( new composition , coat ) . Bioequivalence primarily evaluate pharmacokinetic parameter . Participants ' safety monitor throughout study .
